data.title: Artist: Johnny Mercer
data.meta_description: Johnny Mercer covered Mississippi Mud, St. Louis Blues, There's a Cabin in the Pines, Hooray for Love and other songs. Johnny Mercer originally did Mississippi Mud, Mindin' My Business, There's a Cabin in the Pines, St. Louis Blues and other songs. Johnny Mercer wrote Moon River, Lonesome Polecat (Lament), When the World Was Young, Skylark and other songs.
